com.moradi.circularstatistics

Class CircularStatistics

  • Object
    • CircularStatistics

  • public class CircularStatistics
extends Object
    This class contains methods for performing statistics operations such as the conversation between ranges, distance between angles, average and pearson correlation.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Idan Morad

    • Field Detail

      • CONVERSION_TABLE

        public static final Map<Pair<Double,Double>,Map<Pair<Double,Double>,Function<Double,Double>>> CONVERSION_TABLE
        Table implements as map of maps that receives two pair of ranges of representations of angles and, converts the given value from the range of the first pair to second one.

        For example: CONVERSION_TABLE.get(Pair.of(0,360)).get(Pair.of(-180,180)).apply(270) will output -90

        available ranges are:

        • (0, 360)
        • (-180, 180)
        • (0, 2π)
        • (-π, π)

    • Constructor Detail

      • angleDistanceDegree

        public static double angleDistanceDegree(double angdeg1,
                                         double angdeg2)
        Return the distance between angles.
        Parameters:
        angdeg1 - the starting angle, in degrees.
        angdeg2 - the ending angle, in degrees.
        Returns:
        the distance in range [-180, 180]

      • angleDistanceRadians

        public static double angleDistanceRadians(double angrad1,
                                          double angrad2)
        Return the distance between angles.
        Parameters:
        angrad1 - the starting angle, in radians.
        angrad2 - the ending angle, in radians.
        Returns:
        the distance in range [-π, π]

      • radianAnglesAverage

        public static double radianAnglesAverage(Collection<Double> angrads)
        Calculates the average between radian angles.
        Parameters:
        angrads - collection of degree angles in range (0, 2π) or (-π, π).
        Returns:
        the average.

      • degreeAnglesAverage

        public static double degreeAnglesAverage(Collection<Double> angdegs)
        Calculates the average between degree angles.
        Parameters:
        angdegs - collection of degree angles in range (0, 360) or (-180, 180).
        Returns:
        the average.

      • computePearsonCircularCorrelation

        public static double computePearsonCircularCorrelation(Collection<Double> x,
                                                       Pair<Double,Double> inputRangeX,
                                                       Collection<Double> y,
                                                       Pair<Double,Double> inputRangeY)
        Computes Pearson's circular product-moment correlation coefficients for pairs of collections.
        Parameters:
        x - first data collection.
        inputRangeX - input range of the first collection.
        y - second data collection.
        inputRangeY - input range of the second collection.
        Returns:
        Pearson's circular correlation coefficient for the two collections.
